channel.title: Donator Zone Command
channel.description:
Hey guys, I have a DonatorZone Teleport in my Helmet's Tab (This is a PI base)
But, I was wondering on how I can make a command like ::dz , can any of you give me a code or teach me how I can make this new command Please?

item.title: Donator Zone Command
item.dc:creator: @kirby1996 kirby1996
item.description:
@kirby1996 wrote:

[code=]if (playerCommand.equals("home")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3087, 3498, 0, "modern"); }

Replace that with the name so in ur case it would be

if (playerCommand.equals("dz")) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3087, 3498, 0, "modern"); }

Change the coords =]

Read full topic
